name: The Red Gem
description:
Do you got what it takes to make it out of this cave populated with orcs, indians and deadly traps?

In this game you need the get your hands on the red gem. Interact with the population in this dark humor game and make your way out!

(I recommend buying the gun for better gameplay and ending)

This is a 3week solo school project with the aim to learn the basics of unreal 5, no menu so ALT-F4 to exit the game.
